properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM RESERVATION JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS ='Y'

SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A2.RESERVATION_DATE, A2.RESERVATION_NO, A2.HEADCOUNT, M2.USER_NAME, A2.TOTAL_PRICE, A2.RESERVATION_TIME1, A2.RESERVATION_TIME2, A2.SPACE_NAME, A2.CREATE_DATE, A2.SPACE_MIMG FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.RESERVATION_NO, A.USER_NAME, A.HEADCOUNT, A.TOTAL_PRICE, A.RESERVATION_TIME1, A.RESERVATION_TIME2, A.RESERVATION_DATE, A.SPACE_NAME, S2.USER_NO, A.CREATE_DATE, A.SPACE_MIMG FROM ( SELECT RESERVATION_NO, USER_NAME, HEADCOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, RESERVATION_TIME1, RESERVATION_TIME2, RESERVATION_DATE, SPACE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, SPACE_MIMG FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN RESERVATION_DATE USING(RESERVATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN SPACE S ON R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS ='Y' ) A JOIN SPACE S2 ON A.SPACE_NAME = S2.SPACE_NAME ) A2 JOIN MEMBER M2 ON A2.USER_NO = M2.USER_NO WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_TIME1, RESERVATION_TIME2 FROM RESERVATION_DATE D JOIN RESERVATION R ON (D.RESERVATION_NO=R.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN SPACE S ON (S.SPACE_NO=R.SPACE_NO) WHERE RESERVATION_DATE like ? AND S.SPACE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, HEADCOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, USER_NO, SPACE_NO ) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO RESERVATION_DATE (DATE_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_TIME1, RESERVATION_TIME2, RESERVATION_NO ) VALUES (SEQ_RDNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL )
